question: how soon will sex effect my period?
question_content: My boyfriend and i recently had sex without a condom.  I'm on the pill and I'm supposed to get my period 3 days later. Will I be able to tell that soon if I could be pregnant?

answers.answer_content: If you have been on the pill more than 1 cycle and were using other protection before the pill took effect and you were taking the pill every day without missing one, then no, chances are you are NOT pregnant. If you still don't get your period then you may be nervous about maybe becoming pregnant and this will also delay your period.  If however you haven't been taking your pill correctly and your period becomes a week late, then yes I would then suggest doing a home test.  Good luck and all the best.

You can't tell until you've missed a period...at which point you can take a pregnancy test which will answer your question.. The 1st day of a missed period is supposedly when the first response pregnancy test works... I wouldn't worry about it too much.. Stress can cause it to be late - so you could be late because of stress and not being pregnant. You're on the pill. If you take it regularly you'll probably be fine. Just breathe.

Some girls can tell they are pregnant after two days, there are many factors like taste and smell that are signs. If you don't want to get pregnant then ask the doctor for a morning after pill but mention that you are on the pill first. You can get pregnant while on the pill but it's not very likely
if you dont get your period with in the 3 days wait atleast 2 weeks b4 having a pregnancy test
